bill_title: appropriate money to conduct a wind resource assessment.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to appropriate money to conduct a wind resource assessment. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated from the energy conservation fund the sum of forty- seven thousand dollars ($47,000), or so much thereof as may be necessary, to the Board of Regents for South Dakota State University to conduct an assessment of the wind resources in South Dakota. Section 2. There is hereby appropriated from the energy conservation fund the sum of sixteen thousand dollars ($16,000), or so much thereof as may be necessary, to the Board of Regents for South Dakota State University to conduct an assessment of the wind resources in South Dakota. This section is effective on July 1, 2003. Section 3. There is hereby appropriated from the energy conservation fund the sum of sixteen thousand dollars ($16,000), or so much thereof as may be necessary, to the Board of Regents for South Dakota State University to conduct an assessment of the wind resources in South Dakota. This section is effective on July 1, 2004. Section 4. The assessment shall measure wind speeds at various locations in South Dakota. The wind speed data shall be placed in a publicly accessible database. Section 5. The executive director of the Board of Regents shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act.
